scripts.lint: oxlint --type-aware app/auth app/layout.tsx app/page.tsx app/global-error.tsx app/not-found.tsx app/actions/active-beauty-page.ts components/auth components/locale-provider.tsx components/navigation-provider.tsx i18n lib/api lib/auth proxy.ts
scripts.fmt: oxfmt app/auth app/layout.tsx app/page.tsx app/global-error.tsx app/not-found.tsx app/actions/active-beauty-page.ts components/auth components/locale-provider.tsx components/navigation-provider.tsx i18n lib/api lib/auth proxy.ts package.json tsconfig.json .env.example .dev.vars.example .oxlintrc.json
scripts.fmt:check: oxfmt --check app/auth app/layout.tsx app/page.tsx app/global-error.tsx app/not-found.tsx app/actions/active-beauty-page.ts components/auth components/locale-provider.tsx components/navigation-provider.tsx i18n lib/api lib/auth proxy.ts package.json tsconfig.json .env.example .dev.vars.example .oxlintrc.json
scripts.check: pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck
